members.member:
Represents the SmithChart control which is used to visualize the data graphically.
The SmithChart is often used to make it easier to understand large amount of data and the relationship between different parts of the data. SmithChart can usually be read more quickly than the raw data that they come from. Certain are more useful for presenting a given data set than others.
